## PluginConfigs.importHelpers property

Import emit helpers (e.g. `\__UMDBindCheck`<!-- -->, `\__dynamicImportTransform`<!-- -->, etc..) from ttsclib (a local file in this package).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
importHelpers?: 'inline' | 'auto' | string
```

## Remarks

- "inline": All helpers will emitted in each file - "auto": Let the transform do it - string: A URL, will import helper from that place.
